title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Data Lifecycle Management - Adaptive retention policies
description:
This update allows admins to create retention policies scoped to geography, department, or other user or site attribute. For example, admins can create a policy specifically for users in the UK's human resources team by leveraging the adaptive policy scope.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/get-started-with-data-lifecycle-management?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: October CY2022
